long_description: Super stretchy and sun protective, the Columbia women's Reflection Falls T-Shirt just might get you outside hiking or gardening more often. Polyester/spandex jersey offers comfortable, movement-enhancing 4-way stretch. Omni-Shade(TM) technology delivers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection. Columbia women's Reflection Falls T-Shirt features cap sleeves and gathers at the front neck.
short_description: Super stretchy and sun protective, the Columbia women's Reflection Falls T-Shirt just might get you outside hiking or gardening more often.
